rows.label: qst630502_msg0001
rows.name:
Even Liberalitas isn't safe from
the recent troubles, it seems...

rows.label: qst630502_msg0002
rows.name:
Case in point, a foul beast
known as Pelagic Vincent has
moved in on Merclibay Islet.

rows.label: qst630502_msg0003
rows.name:
You lot seem capable, so I hope
you can put a stop to it...

rows.label: qst630502_msg0101
rows.name:
Well now, you're a sight for sore
eyes! I take it the job went well?

rows.label: qst630502_msg0102
rows.name: What's this now? Three of them?

rows.label: qst630502_msg0103
rows.name:
Ah, that would explain why none of
the sightings seemed to match...

rows.label: qst630502_msg0104
rows.name:
One Driver said it was a wild
beast, some ship captain said it
was more like a bird monster...

rows.label: qst630502_msg0105
rows.name:
It never even occurred to
me that there might be
more than one! Ahahaha!

rows.label: qst630502_msg0106
rows.name:
O-oh, well, what's important
is that even those three
monsters were no match for you!

rows.label: qst630502_msg0107
rows.name:
Now the ships are safe and
everything's right as rain. Right?

rows.label: qst630502_msg0108
rows.name:
No fooling though, you lot might
just be the strongest Drivers and
Blades that Alst has ever seen.

rows.label: qst630502_msg0109
rows.name:
If I hear of any more big
jobs, I'll be sure to leave
'em to you! Ahahaha!

rows.label: qst630502_msg0110
rows.name:
I hope if the time
comes, you'll accept.

rows.label: qst630502_msg0111
rows.name:
Oh, and so's I don't forget, here's
the reward I owe you. It's quite hefty,
but you've earned every last G!
